ygData.subject: Re: Pod Trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hours? Did you say hours? oh no. she leaned forward in her seat and rested her head in her hands. It t not the flying, it s the falling and the heights

::Spears::

"Hours? Did you say hours? oh no." she leaned forward in her seat and 
rested her head in her hands. "It't not the flying, it's the falling 
and the heights I can't stand." She sat there shaking from 
nerves.  "AND PLEASE don't mention an attack.  That's the last thing 
I need right now."  She was still breathing heavy and sweating a 
little.
"Look, I'm a good fighter, I have my fair share of battle scars, not 
to mention a few new ones on the way," She looked at her side,"And I 
normally keep a cool head. But I just can't deal with he...heights."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker chuckles at Spears' outburst. "Don't worry, flying isn't 
too bad. The 
> worst that can happen right now is a Predacon attack. Then we're 
most-linkely 
> dead."
> 
> He puts the pod on autopilot and walks over to Spears, putting a 
hand on her 
> shoulder.
> 
> "You'll be fine," he says, trying to confort her, "We'll get there 
in a few 
> hours or so."
